sentences.english: And they took their journey from Succoth， and encamped in Etham， in the edge of the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 他们从疏割起行，在旷野边的以倘安营。

sentences.english: If this year to start, first phase will be completed in one or two years.
sentences.chinese: 倘今年能动工，首阶段将于一两年内落成。

sentences.english: After putting out the burning arc, If the resumption of high-voltage, Re-ignite the phenomenon also occurs.
sentences.chinese: 燃弧熄灭后，倘恢复电压较高，也会发生重燃现象。

sentences.english: If I die what will be my reward?
sentences.chinese: 倘我死去，能有什么报偿？

sentences.english: Country in case is theoretical and without honest wisdom, say.
sentences.chinese: 国倘理论而无实在智慧，则曰。

sentences.english: Deposit will be forfeited if the locker key is lost.
sentences.chinese: 倘遗失储物箱锁匙，按金概不发还。

sentences.english: And they departed from Succoth， and pitched in Etham， which is in the edge of the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 从疏割起行，安营在旷野边的以倘。

sentences.english: To read more, if not used, it is a fruitless bud.
sentences.chinese: 读书再多，倘不应用，就是一朵不结果实的花蕾。

sentences.english: The rivers, if they were wise, would stay where they are.
sentences.chinese: 江河倘有智慧，必将停在它们的所在。

sentences.english: I understand that I will not be eligible for this program if the information relating to this application is false.
sentences.chinese: 倘有失实，本人明白大会有权取消本人之申请资格。

sentences.english: And they departed from Succoth, and pitched in Etham, which is in the edge of the wilderness.
sentences.chinese: 从疏割起行，安营在旷野边的以倘。

sentences.english: Youll miss the train unless you hurry up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你不快点，你就会误了这倘火车。

sentences.english: In the event that TES decides not to proceed to the Repair Service step.
sentences.chinese: 倘工商业污水附加费决定不进行修复服务一步。

sentences.english: But for instruments and equipment, the modern marine scientists would be helpless.
sentences.chinese: 倘没有仪器设备，现代的海洋科学家也无能为力。

sentences.english: Drag the magnified image for whole view if the image cannot be wholly shown.
sentences.chinese: 倘图片无法一次过全然显示，可拖曳图片作整张检视。

sentences.english: If the A. M. Session is full, would you consider the P. M. Session?
sentences.chinese: 倘上午班额满，贵家长是否考虑让子女就读下午班？

definition: classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
